name: Shark Tank
text: All face-up WATER monsters gain 500 ATK. Once per turn: You can reduce or increase the level of a face-up Fish type monster you control by 1; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Shark" monster from your Deck in face-up attack position. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect except WATER monsters. You can only activate 1 "Shark Tank" per turn.
